channel.description: Recent content in Downloads on Jare's Blog

item.title: Downloads
item.description: Articles and lecture slides Slides from my talks at Mundos Digitales and GameLab, July 2006 (in Spanish). Slides from my talk at the Universidad Politecnica de Catalunya, March 2006 (in Spanish). Slides from my talk at the Universidad Complutense de Madrid, April 2005 (in Spanish). Slides from my talk at the University of Seville in March 2003 (in Spanish). Source Code RectLayout, a class to aid in resolution-independent 2D layout of rectangles.
